answers.answer: ask yur dr fur a blood test
Get a blood test from doctor.
Terrified of needles can't do it ahh
If ur pregnant u better get used to it now. It will happen a lot in ur future. Lol
Ask the tech to use a butterfly needle and DO NOT LOOK. They don't need much. I usually read something sticker or whatever the have on the wall when they draw. You can. Its mind over matter
There's a difference between mind over matter and havin a serious fear
How do u plan to make it thru pregnancy and labor without being stuck with a needle?
Why would the hormone not be Der after two weeks? ?
I don't want any drugs I no alot of ppl that made it thru my best friend did
If it's not showing up on a urine test by now, the only other way to confirm pregnancy is through blood or ultrasound.

U know ur blood type? Do u know if U'll get gest diabetes?  U know if U'll become anemic? Those all have to be checked. What if u become dehydrated? Iv is how they get it back. Drugs are only a small small part of it. Im all for drug free! Totally tried with my first. Tho c-section was required.

and most healthcare professionals with turn you down completely(as in seeing you as a patient) if you deny getting blood tests done. I know at my ob/gyn's office, if we deny the gestational diabetes test they discharge us as a patient, and we have to find a new doctor, which is very hard depending on insurance.
Oh how about this.  Maybe your period is LATE.  I went 9 months without a period and I WAS NOT prego.

You cannot tell a doctor no needles wheb you're pregnant, almost every appointment I have been to they have taken blood for some test or another. If you want a baby you have to realize its not all about you anymore. A couple pricks with a needle is nothing compared to labor anyways. Plus, a blood test is the very best way to tell if you are pregnant at home pregnancy tests aren't as accurate as stores would have you believe.

question: Hi girls I'm new to this but I need help I 14days late and negative 7altogether I hope I am but ahh so annoying please post :-)
title: 14days late
